Text: Thanks for the upload, seeded for about a week.  Quick question tho, is there a way to convert the files to mp3's rather than have them open with vlc?

It's easy to convert to mp3.  Since all files on in an iso format mount the .cue file in a virtual CD (I use MagicISO since it is free and works with Windows 7)  Then just use any CD ripping software and convert to mp3 or whatever format you want.
Awesome!!, thanks a lot, ill seed :D
